text: Cadaba insularis is a species of plant in the Capparaceae family endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry shrubland, and is threatened by habitat loss.Miller, A. 2004. Cadaba insularis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
